verses.text: \w Forasmuch|strong="G1895"\w* as \w many|strong="G4183"\w* have taken in \w hand|strong="G2021"\w* to set forth in \w order|strong="G0392"\w* a \w declaration|strong="G1335"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* those \w things|strong="G4229"\w* which are most surely \w believed|strong="G4135"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w*,

Even \w as|strong="G2531"\w* they \w delivered|strong="G3860"\w* them unto \w us|strong="G2254"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w beginning|strong="G0746"\w* \w were|strong="G1096"\w* \w eyewitnesses|strong="G0845"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w ministers|strong="G5257"\w* of the \w word|strong="G3056"\w*;

It seemed \w good|strong="G1380"\w* to me \w also|strong="G2504"\w*, having \w had|strong="G3877"\w* \w perfect|strong="G0199"\w* \w understanding|strong="G3877"\w* of all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* from the very \w first|strong="G0509"\w*, to \w write|strong="G1125"\w* unto \w thee|strong="G4671"\w* in \w order|strong="G2517"\w*, most \w excellent|strong="G2903"\w* \w Theophilus|strong="G2321"\w*,

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* thou mightest \w know|strong="G1921"\w* the \w certainty|strong="G0803"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* those \w things|strong="G3056"\w*, \w wherein|strong="G3739"\w* thou hast been \w instructed|strong="G2727"\w*.

¶ There \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w days|strong="G2250"\w* of \w Herod|strong="G2264"\w*, the \w king|strong="G0935"\w* of \w Judæa|strong="G2449"\w*, a \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w priest|strong="G2409"\w* \w named|strong="G3686"\w* \w Zacharias|strong="G2197"\w*, \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w course|strong="G2183"\w* of \w Abia|strong="G0007"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w* \add was\add* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w daughters|strong="G2364"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="G0002"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \add was\add* \w Elisabeth|strong="G1665"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w both|strong="G0297"\w* \w righteous|strong="G1342"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w walking|strong="G4198"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w commandments|strong="G1785"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w ordinances|strong="G1345"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w blameless|strong="G0273"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w had|strong="G2258"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w child|strong="G5043"\w*, because \w that|strong="G2530"\w* \w Elisabeth|strong="G1665"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w barren|strong="G4723"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w both|strong="G0297"\w* \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \add now\add* well \w stricken|strong="G4260"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w years|strong="G2250"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* it came to \w pass|strong="G1096"\w*, that \w while|strong="G1722"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* executed the \w priest’s office|strong="G2407"\w* \w before|strong="G1725"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w order|strong="G5010"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w course|strong="G2183"\w*,

According \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w custom|strong="G1485"\w* of the \w priest’s office|strong="G2405"\w*, his lot \w was|strong="G2975"\w* to burn \w incense|strong="G2370"\w* when he \w went|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w temple|strong="G3485"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w whole|strong="G3956"\w* \w multitude|strong="G4128"\w* of the \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w praying|strong="G4336"\w* \w without|strong="G1854"\w* at the \w time|strong="G5610"\w* of \w incense|strong="G2368"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* there \w appeared|strong="G3700"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w* an \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w standing|strong="G2476"\w* \w on|strong="G1537"\w* the right \w side|strong="G1188"\w* of the \w altar|strong="G2379"\w* of \w incense|strong="G2368"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G1492"\w* \w Zacharias|strong="G2197"\w* \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \add him\add*, he was \w troubled|strong="G5015"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w fear|strong="G5401"\w* \w fell|strong="G1968"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* the \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Fear|strong="G5399"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*, \w Zacharias|strong="G2197"\w*: \w for|strong="G1360"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w prayer|strong="G1162"\w* is \w heard|strong="G1522"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w* \w Elisabeth|strong="G1665"\w* shall \w bear|strong="G1080"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w* a \w son|strong="G5207"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* thou shalt \w call|strong="G2564"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w thou|strong="G4671"\w* shalt \w have|strong="G2071"\w* \w joy|strong="G5479"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w gladness|strong="G0020"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* shall \w rejoice|strong="G5463"\w* \w at|strong="G1909"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w birth|strong="G1083"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* he shall \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* in the sight \w of|strong="G1799"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* shall \w drink|strong="G4095"\w* \w neither|strong="G3756"\w* \w wine|strong="G3631"\w* \w nor|strong="G2532"\w* strong \w drink|strong="G4608"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he shall be \w filled|strong="G4130"\w* \w with|strong="G4151"\w* the \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w*, \w even|strong="G2089"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mother’s|strong="G3384"\w* \w womb|strong="G2836"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* of the \w children|strong="G5207"\w* of \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w* shall he \w turn|strong="G1994"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* shall \w go|strong="G4281"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w* of \w Elias|strong="G2243"\w*, to \w turn|strong="G1994"\w* the \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w* of the \w fathers|strong="G3962"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* the \w children|strong="G5043"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w disobedient|strong="G0545"\w* \w to|strong="G1722"\w* the \w wisdom|strong="G5428"\w* of the \w just|strong="G1342"\w*; to make \w ready|strong="G2090"\w* a \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w prepared|strong="G2680"\w* for the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Zacharias|strong="G2197"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* the \w angel|strong="G0032"\w*, \w Whereby|strong="G2596"\w* shall I \w know|strong="G1097"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w*? \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* an old \w man|strong="G4246"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w* well \w stricken|strong="G4260"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w years|strong="G2250"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* \w answering|strong="G0611"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w Gabriel|strong="G1043"\w*, \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w stand|strong="G3936"\w* in the \w presence|strong="G1799"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* am \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* to \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w shew|strong="G2097"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w* \w these|strong="G5023"\w* glad \w tidings|strong="G2097"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, thou shalt \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w dumb|strong="G4623"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w able|strong="G1410"\w* to \w speak|strong="G2980"\w*, \w until|strong="G0891"\w* the \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w* shall be \w performed|strong="G1096"\w*, \w because|strong="G0473"\w* thou \w believest|strong="G4100"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w words|strong="G3056"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* shall be \w fulfilled|strong="G4137"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w season|strong="G2540"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w waited|strong="G4328"\w* for \w Zacharias|strong="G2197"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w marvelled|strong="G2296"\w* \w that|strong="G1722"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* tarried so \w long|strong="G5549"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w temple|strong="G3485"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when he came \w out|strong="G1831"\w*, he \w could|strong="G1410"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w perceived|strong="G1921"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he had \w seen|strong="G3708"\w* a \w vision|strong="G3701"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w temple|strong="G3485"\w*: \w for|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w beckoned|strong="G1269"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w remained|strong="G1265"\w* \w speechless|strong="G2974"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* it came to \w pass|strong="G1096"\w*, that, as soon \w as|strong="G5613"\w* the \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w of|strong="G3009"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w ministration|strong="G3009"\w* were \w accomplished|strong="G4130"\w*, he \w departed|strong="G0565"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* his \w own|strong="G0846"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w those|strong="G3778"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w* \w Elisabeth|strong="G1665"\w* \w conceived|strong="G4815"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w hid|strong="G4032"\w* \w herself|strong="G1438"\w* \w five|strong="G4002"\w* \w months|strong="G3376"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*,

\w Thus|strong="G3779"\w* \w hath|strong="G4160"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w dealt|strong="G4160"\w* with \w me|strong="G3427"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w wherein|strong="G3739"\w* he looked \w on|strong="G1896"\w* \add me\add*, to take \w away|strong="G0851"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w reproach|strong="G3681"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w sixth|strong="G1623"\w* \w month|strong="G3376"\w* the \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* \w Gabriel|strong="G1043"\w* was \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* \w from|strong="G5259"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* a \w city|strong="G4172"\w* of \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*, \w named|strong="G3686"\w* \w Nazareth|strong="G3478"\w*,

\w To|strong="G4314"\w* a \w virgin|strong="G3933"\w* \w espoused|strong="G3423"\w* to a \w man|strong="G0435"\w* \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* name \w was|strong="G3686"\w* \w Joseph|strong="G2501"\w*, \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w house|strong="G3624"\w* of \w David|strong="G1138"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w virgin’s|strong="G3933"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \add was\add* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* came \w in|strong="G1525"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, and \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Hail|strong="G5463"\w*, \add thou that art\add* highly \w favoured|strong="G5487"\w*, the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \add is\add* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w thee|strong="G4675"\w*: \w blessed|strong="G2127"\w* \add art\add* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w women|strong="G1135"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when she \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \add him\add*, she was \w troubled|strong="G1298"\w* \w at|strong="G1909"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w saying|strong="G3056"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* cast in her \w mind|strong="G1260"\w* what manner \w of|strong="G4217"\w* \w salutation|strong="G0783"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* should \w be|strong="G1498"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Fear|strong="G5399"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*, \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* thou hast \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w favour|strong="G5485"\w* \w with|strong="G3844"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, thou shalt \w conceive|strong="G4815"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* thy \w womb|strong="G1064"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* bring \w forth|strong="G5088"\w* a \w son|strong="G5207"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* shalt \w call|strong="G2564"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \w JESUS|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w He|strong="G3778"\w* shall \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* shall be \w called|strong="G2564"\w* the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of the \w Highest|strong="G5310"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* shall \w give|strong="G1325"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w* the \w throne|strong="G2362"\w* \w of|strong="G3962"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w father|strong="G3962"\w* \w David|strong="G1138"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he shall \w reign|strong="G0936"\w* \w over|strong="G1909"\w* the \w house|strong="G3624"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="G2384"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G0932"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* there shall \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w end|strong="G5056"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* the \w angel|strong="G0032"\w*, \w How|strong="G4459"\w* \w shall|strong="G2071"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \w be|strong="G2071"\w*, \w seeing|strong="G1893"\w* I \w know|strong="G1097"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* a \w man|strong="G0435"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* and \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, The \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w* shall \w come|strong="G1904"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w power|strong="G1411"\w* of the \w Highest|strong="G5310"\w* shall \w overshadow|strong="G1982"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*: \w therefore|strong="G1352"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* that holy \w thing|strong="G0040"\w* which shall be born of \w thee|strong="G1080"\w* shall be \w called|strong="G2564"\w* the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w cousin|strong="G4773"\w* \w Elisabeth|strong="G1665"\w*, \w she|strong="G0846"\w* \w hath|strong="G4815"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w conceived|strong="G4815"\w* a \w son|strong="G5207"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* old \w age|strong="G1094"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w sixth|strong="G1623"\w* \w month|strong="G3376"\w* with \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, who was \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w barren|strong="G4723"\w*.
\w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w with|strong="G3844"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3756"\w* shall be \w impossible|strong="G0101"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Behold|strong="G2400"\w* the \w handmaid|strong="G1399"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*; be \w it|strong="G1096"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3427"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w word|strong="G4487"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* \w departed|strong="G0565"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* \w arose|strong="G0450"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w those|strong="G3778"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*, and \w went|strong="G4198"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the hill \w country|strong="G3714"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w haste|strong="G4710"\w*, \w into|strong="G1519"\w* a \w city|strong="G4172"\w* of \w Juda|strong="G2448"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w house|strong="G3624"\w* of \w Zacharias|strong="G2197"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w saluted|strong="G0782"\w* \w Elisabeth|strong="G1665"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* it came to \w pass|strong="G1096"\w*, that, \w when|strong="G5613"\w* \w Elisabeth|strong="G1665"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* the \w salutation|strong="G0783"\w* of \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w*, the \w babe|strong="G1025"\w* \w leaped|strong="G4640"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w womb|strong="G2836"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Elisabeth|strong="G1665"\w* was \w filled|strong="G4130"\w* with \w the|strong="G4151"\w* \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G0040"\w*:
